Package com.csse3200.game.ui.tutorial

Class LevelMapTutorial

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.rendering.RenderComponent
com.csse3200.game.ui.UIComponent
com.csse3200.game.ui.tutorial.LevelMapTutorial
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Renderable, Comparable<Renderable>
public class LevelMapTutorial extends UIComponent
Displays a step-by-step tutorial overlay for the Level Map screen.

This tutorial introduces players to core gameplay mechanics such as placing defence units, resource generation and combat behaviour. It appears as a dialog box with a darkened background overlay and progresses through predefined messages when the player presses the space bar or clicks on the 'next' button which is displayed as a white arrow on the bottom-right of the dialog box.

The tutorial ends either after the final message or when the user clicks the "Skip Tutorial" button displayed on the bottom-right of the screen.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      Initialises the tutorial UI components, including the overlay, dialog box, message label, next button and skip tutorial button. Pauses the game while active.
      Overrides:
      create in class UIComponent

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the tutorial logic based on user input. Advances the tutorial when the space bar or the 'next' button is pressed. Ends the tutorial after the final step.
      Overrides:
      update in class Component

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Cleans up tutorial UI elements and removes them from the stage.
